articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: Where will the annular solar eclipse on Oct. 2, 2024 be visible? - Space.com
articles.description: The 'ring of fire' annular solar eclipse on Oct. 2, 2024 will pass through the Pacific and South America.
articles.content:
An annular solar eclipse will occur on Oct. 2, 2024
, when the moon's central shadow will not quite reach Earth. The result will be a 'ring of fire' visible to those within a broad path across the P… [+6719 chars]
